descript.abstract: This dataset outlines areas that had residential land use in 1945 and 1959 as shown on a map included in the Metropolitan Land Study, dated April 1960.
descript.purpose: The data was collected by scanning and digitizing the Residential Land Use map (Figure 13) from page 30 of the Metropolitan Land Study prepared by the Metropolitan Planning Commission in April 1960, so that it is available in digital form and may be used as a historical reference layer in GIS.
descript.supplinf: Portion of Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area defined by the study area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.

timeperd.current: Date the data collected for the 1959 land use is on the map.

theme.themekey: land use, residential, planning and development

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County

browse.browsed: Sample map showing the 1945 and 1959 Residential Land Use layer

citeinfo.title: 1958 General Land Use Map published for the 'The Challenge of Metropolitan Growth', the Metropolitan Planning Commission's (MPC) 1st report. Industrial Land Use map (Fig. 11, pg.n) Land Study, by the MPC.

dataqual.complete: A portion of the seven county geographic area is covered, as defined by the study area on the original map.

horizpa.horizpar: The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy.

procstep.procdesc:
Original Data for the Residential Land Use map (Fig 13) from the Metropolitan Land Study, 4/1960, showing 1945 and 1959 residential land use was collected from 1945 aerial photographs and 1958 aerial photographs updated with field checks in 1959.
The digital data was collected by scanning and digitizing the Residential Land Use map (Figure 13) from page 30 of the Metropolitan Land Study prepared by the Metropolitan Planning Commission in April 1960.

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One layer for entire seven county region.

overview.eaover:
RESDEVYR: Residential Development Year 4, 4, C
Possible Codes = 0, 1945, 1959
overview.eadetcit: Metropolitan Land Study, Metropolitan Planning Report Number Four, April 1960, Twin Cities Metropolitan Planning Commission

distinfo.distliab: NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.
